amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to negotiate or enter into a trade agreement that establishes a limit on greenhouse gas emissions for the United States. The limitation described in this section shall not apply in the case of the administration of a tax or tariff.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to negotiate or enter into a trade agreement that establishes a limit on greenhouse gas emissions for the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Meadows.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
